sentences.en: A circ is an undirected graph having only vertices of even nonzero degree.
sentences.cn: 一广义圈是一无向图,其顶点次数都是非零偶数.

sentences.en: Broadcast networks can be expressed by a simple connected undirected graph.
sentences.cn: 将广播网络用简单连通的无向图表示.

sentences.en: To determine a given undirected network whether it is connected?
sentences.cn: 判断给定的无向网是否是连通的?

sentences.en: Undirected, however, it can wreak havoc in your day - to - day experience.
sentences.cn: 然而, 它也可以间接让你发泄堆积在心中的忿怒.

sentences.en: Unenlightened and undirected, I can do so little.
sentences.cn: 但若得不到启蒙和指导，我就差不多无能为力了。

trans.tran_cn: 未受指导的，无收件人姓名的
